ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This study was supported by the Portuguese Foundation for Science and Technology (FCT). It was under the scope of the strategic funding of the UID/BIO/04469/2013 unit, COMPETE 2020 (POCI‐01‐0145‐FEDER‐006684), and the BioTecNorte operation (NORTE‐01‐0145‐FEDER‐000004), funded by the European Regional Development Fund through Norte2020—Programa Operacional Regional do Norte. RRMP has accepted the IOI Professorial Chair, Department of Plant Protection, Universiti Putra Malaysia, Malaysia.
